caller_intent: The caller needed guidance on completing an Auto Owners insurance policy, including electronic signature, payment options, and adding an additional interest (property management company) to the policy.
resolution_steps: Heather confirmed the caller received an electronic invitation from Auto Owners to sign the policy.
Explained payment options: portal (credit card) or phone payment.
Addressed the need to add an additional interest (property management company) to the policy.
Offered to update the policy with the management company's details once provided.
Mentioned resending evidence of insurance after updates.
systems_referenced: Auto Owners portal (for electronic signature and payment)
Alliance Insurance internal systems (for policy updates)
summary: Heather assisted the caller with completing an Auto Owners insurance policy, clarified payment options, and discussed adding a property management company as an additional interest. The caller agreed to handle payment via the portal and provide details for the additional interest update.
